title: Windows 10 will soon let you send text messages through Cortana
text:
Windows 10 will soon let you send text messages through Cortana 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Yesterday 
Leaked internal builds of Windows 10 have revealed plans to integrate text messaging into the operating system through Cortana, including te...
